snippet: A second white supremacist prison gang member whose name surfaced during an investigation into the killing of Colorado’s prisons chief was arrested Thursday evening, authorities said.
abstract: Thomas Guolee, second white supremacist prison gang member tied to investigation into killing of Colorado prisons chief Tom Clements, is arrested on unrelated parole violation.
lead_paragraph: A second white supremacist prison gang member whose name surfaced during an investigation into the killing of Colorado’s prisons chief was arrested Thursday evening, authorities said.

headline.main: Colorado: 2nd Man Tied to Killing Suspect Is Arrested
headline.print_headline: Colorado: 2nd Man Tied To Killing Suspect Is Arrested
